remarks:
Existential quantification restricted to a Cartesian product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.) 

---

 Existential quantification restricted to a cross product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ralxp.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexxp $p |- ( E. x e. ( A X. B ) ph <-> E. y e. A E. z e. B ps ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
